videoSnippet.title: 2900!!! || Yi Wei vs Carlsen || GCT Cote d’Ivoire (2019)
videoSnippet.description:
Send us your manga ideas here agadmatormanga@gmail.com

Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Wei Yi vs Magnus Carlsen
Grand Chess Tour Cote d’Ivoire (Rapid) (2019), Abidjan CIV, rd 9, May-10 
Sicilian Defense: Old Sicilian. General (B30)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. c3 Qa5 4. Na3 e6 5. Nc4 Qd8 6. d4 d5 7. ed5 ed5 8. Nce5 Bd6 9. Be3 c4 10. b3 cb3 11. ab3 Nge7 12. Bd3 Bf5 13. O-O O-O 14. Bf4 Be5 15. Ne5 Ne5 16. Bf5 N5g6 17. Bg5 Qc7 18. Bg6 Ng6 19. Qf3 Qd7 20. Ra5 b5 21. Rfa1 h6 22. Bd2 Rfe8 23. Qd3 a6 24. Ra6 Ra6 25. Ra6 Nf4 26. Qf3 Qf5 27. Ra1 Ne2 28. Kf1 Qc2 29. Qe2 Re2 30. Ke2 Qe4 31. Kf1 Qc2 32. Ke2 Qb3 33. Rc1 Qc4 34. Ke3 Qc7 35. f4 Qe7 36. Kf2 Qe4 37. Re1 Qd3 38. Re2 f6 39. Ke1 Kf7 40. Re3 Qb1 41. Kf2 h5 42. h3 h4 43. Be1 Kg6 44. Rf3 Kf5 45. Ke2 Qe4 46. Kf1 b4 47. cb4 Qd4 48. Bh4 Qc4 49. Kg1 Qb4 50. Kf1 Qc4 51. Kg1 Qe2 52. Bf2 d4 53. Bd4 Qd1 54. Kh2 Qd4 55. Rf1 g6 56. Rf3 Qd2 57. Rf1 Ke4 58. Rf3 Qe2 59. Rg3 Qh5 60. Rg4 Ke3

The Côte d’Ivoire Rapid & Blitz is the 1st stage of the 2019 Grand Chess Tour, with World Champion Magnus Carlsen heading a 10-player field that features 7 tour regulars and wild cards Wei Yi, Veselin Topalov and Bassem Amin. The event takes place in the Pullman Abidjan Hotel in Abidjan, Ivory Coast from May 8-12 and has a $150,000 prize fund.

The rapid section is a single round-robin with 3 rounds each day on the first 3 days. The time control is 25 minutes for all moves and a 10-second delay from move 1. The final 2 days are a blitz double round-robin, with 18 rounds of 5 minutes + 3-second delay blitz. Rapid games count double, with 2 points for a win and 1 for a draw. 

Official website: grandchesstour.org/2019-grand-chess-tour/2019-Cote-dIvoire-Rapid-Blitz
